sentences.en: He would not agree to a cessation of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 他不会同意敌对状态的停止。

sentences.en: Mexico called for an immediate cessation of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥要求立即停止敌对行动。

sentences.en: There is still no universally agreed-on explanation for why there should be such a dramatic cessation of tree growth at the upper timberline.
sentences.cn: 对于为什么树线以上的树木会突然停止生长，至今还没有一个公认的解释。
